Class JPanelTransitionControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

          • javax.swing.JPanel

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JPanelTransitionControl
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel contains other JPanel to configure the transition settings.
    Author:
    chavailm
